message: Hi Bob, I'm excited to offer you this incredible product. Given its value and potential, I'm proposing a starting price of $22,000. I'm confident you'll recognize its worth.

I appreciate your enthusiasm for the product, but I'm looking to save as much as possible. I'm willing to pay $18,000 for it. I believe this is a fair price considering the market value and my budget.
Bob, I understand your desire to save, but my initial offer reflects the true value of this product.  I'm willing to come down slightly to $20,000. This is my final offer.

I appreciate your willingness to negotiate, but $20,000 is still a bit too high for me. I'm willing to meet you halfway and offer $19,000. I think this is a fair compromise considering the value and my budget.
